lines.text:
[Derisively after seeing Piper exit a cab in front of the theater in top hat and tails]
I know him! Inspector Piper - homicide squad - imitating a head waiter.

[after she has been kissed by Windy]
Windy, this has got to stop! We've got to be sensible. We can't go on fooling Ricky forever.
Don't worry. Nobody could make Ricky believe you're anything but the angel he thinks you are.

[Cynically]
Funny about women... they never tell their fiances about the boyfriend.

[after Hildegarde accidentally finds herself onstage during a dance number]
I didn't know you had it in you, sister.

[Annoyed]
He would have to get himself bumped off just when I want to see a show!
